meanings.definition: Resembling a chimney in appearance or function.
meanings.sent1: The tall, narrow tower was chimneylike, reaching high into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The house had a chimneylike structure that emitted smoke when the fireplace was lit.
meanings.sent3: The chimneylike building seemed to puff out clouds of steam, but it was just a clever design.
meanings.sent4: The factory's chimneylike exhaust pipes spewed out pollutants into the air.
meanings.sent5: The chimneylike structure loomed over the town, a constant reminder of industrial progress.
